Bases: django.views.generic.list.ListView

View to see the list of all Thing objects

static combine(queryset: List) → django.db.models.query.QuerySet

Used to combine QuerySet objects in a list of QuerySet objects

get(request: django.http.response.HttpResponse, *args: Any, **kwargs: Dict[str, Any]) → django.http.response.HttpResponse

Gets the link to the appropriate view Redirects user to the ThingListView or if there is only one Thing object in the QuerySet object, redirects to that Thing’s DetailView Saves the user time

static get_cat_dependent_filters(query_fields: Dict[str, str], query_categories: List[str]) → Dict[str, Any]

Returns a dictionary of all the filters in the querystring of the URL that depend on a Thing’s category

static get_cat_independent_filters(query_fields: Dict[str, str]) → Dict[str, Any]

Returns a dictionary of all the filters in the querystring of the URL that are independent of a Thing’s category

get_context_data(**kwargs: Dict[str, Any])

Determines the variables accessible within the template for this view

get_filtered_query(query_fields: Dict[str, str], query_categories: Dict[str, str]) → django.db.models.query.QuerySet

Returns a QuerySet object of all objects that satisfy the querystring parameters in the URL

get_query_categories() → List[str]

Returns a list of all categories in the querystring of the URL

get_query_fields() → Dict[str, str]

Returns a dictionary with the name of the parameters and their values in the querystring of the URL, except categories

get_queryset() → django.db.models.query.QuerySet

Gets all the Thing objects to be displayed Returns only the Thing objects that fit the filters in the request’s querystring

static get_search_filters(query_fields, query_categories)

core.views.user.register(request: django.http.response.HttpResponse) → django.http.response.HttpResponse

View used to register a user Redirects user to index page or if there is a next URL parameter, redirects user to appropriate page

View used to login a user Redirects user to index page or if there is a next URL parameter, redirects user to appropriate page

core.views.user.user_logout(request: django.http.response.HttpResponse) → django.http.response.HttpResponse

View to logout user Redirects user to index page
